original_title: 僕を助けてくれた大好きな女子が体育会系クズにレ×プされているのに… 青空ひかり
overview: "Hikari-chan" is my first love and I went to school with her all the time. You were in the karate club, so I mustered up the courage and joined the club. I had heard bad rumors about the male club members and thought I would endure some bullying. I can't stand Hikari becoming a target because of me...
title: The Girl I Love Who Helped Me Out Is Getting Fucked By Jocks, But… Hikari Aozora
